member.name: T:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions
member.summary: Represents drawing options.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.Default
member.summary: Indicates the default instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.GridBorderRoundedRectangleCornerRadius
member.summary: Indicates corner radius ratio of rounded rectangle of border lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.12.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThinLineWidth
member.summary: Indicates stroke thickness ratio of thin lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.015.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThickLineWidth
member.summary: Indicates stroke thickness ratio of thick lines, relative to cell size. By default it's 0.06.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Represents background color. By default it's equivalent value of color .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThinLineColor
member.summary: Represents thin line color. By default it's equivalent value of color .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.ThickLineColor
member.summary: Represents thick line color. By default it's equivalent value of color .

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasDrawingOptions.GridLineTemplate
member.summary:
Represents grid line template to be drawn. By default it will be initialized as a like this:
(9, 9, 3, 3, )

member.summary: Indicates the default options.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.CanvasExportingOptions.Quality
member.summary: Indicates the quality. Range 0..100. Default 80.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper
member.summary: Represents a point mapper instance.

member.summary: Represents a point mapper instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.CellWidthAndHeight
member.summary: Indicates cell width and height of pixels. By design, cell width is equal to cell height.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.Margin
member.summary: Indicates margin (pixel size of empty spaces between the fact sudoku grid and borders of the picture).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.RowsCount
member.summary: Indicates the number of rows. The number of rows should be an absolute value, including reserved regions (used by drawing outside-like puzzles).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.ColumnsCount
member.summary: Indiactes the number of columns. The number of columns should be an absolute value, including reserved regions (used by drawing outside-like puzzles).

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.GridSize
member.summary: Indicates grid size instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.FullSize
member.summary: Indicates full canvas size instance.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.FullSizeInteger
member.summary: Indicates full canvas size instance, in integer format.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.GetCenterPoint(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns center position (point) of the specified absolute row and column absolute index.
member.returns: The point instance that represents the target center position.

member.summary: Returns top-left position (point) of the specified absolute row and column absolute index.
member.returns: The point instance that represents the target top-left position.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Graphics.PointMapper.GetTopRightPoint(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns top-right position (point) of the specified absolute row and column absolute index.

member.returns: The point instance that represents the target bottom-left position.

member.summary: Returns bottom-right position (point) of the specified absolute row and column absolute index.
member.returns: The point instance that represents the target bottom-right position.
